roleset.name: make rapid talking noises
roleset.note: CHATTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chatter' based on sentences in brown. (from chatter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually intransitive
example.text: Her teeth chattered so that she made three attempts at speech before she became intelligible.
example.arg: so that she made three attempts at speech before she became intelligible

example.name: with manner
example.text: Two women, who [*T*-2] had been chattering like parrots, were struck dumb.

example.name: with topic
example.text: [Maggie]*-1 was looking much happier already, [*-1]clearing a space on the table and chattering about how she could put up a typewriter right there...
example.arg: about how she could put a typewriter right there

roleset.name: talk rapidly
roleset.note: CHATTER_AWAY-V NOTES: No VNcls, but see those related to chatter.01. Added by Julia based on ULA. (from chatter.02-v)

example.name: with COM
example.text: She watched the psi bob her head , unaware of the rest of the bridge , shaking blonde curls as she chattered away with the approaching psi relay on Mason 's ship .
example.arg: with the approaching psi relay on Mason's ship
